name: Ruchi Gold
description: Ruchi Gold Refined Palm Oil is rich in Vitamin E, a natural antioxidant that prevents cell deterioration. The goodness of natural vitamins makes it a nutritious and healthy option. Refined palmolein oil. Free from argemone oil.

name: Sun Rich
description: Patanjali Foods Ltd Sunrich Refined Sunflower Oil is made with high quality ingredients. It is a rich source of stearic acid, oleic acid, selenium, and linoleic acid. Sunflower oil is one of the healthiest oils for cooking and is preferred for its multiple health benefits. It is healthy and perfectly easy to digest

name: Reb Label
description: Johnnie Walker Red Label is crackling with spice and bursting with vibrant, smoky flavours. It's a blend that combines light whiskies from Scotland's East Coast and more peaty whiskies from the West, creating an extraordinary depth of flavour.

name: Idli Rava
description: Vijay Gold Idli Rava is a must-have for all Indian kitchens. This premium product not only helps you prepare pillowy, soft idlis but many more delicacies like dhokla, uttapams and upmas.

name: Sugar
description: A sweet substance that is made up wholly or mostly of sucrose, is colorless or white when pure, is obtained from plants (as sugarcane or sugar beets), is a source of dietary carbohydrate, and is used as a sweetener and preservative of other foods.

name: Kesari Rava
description: The Special Kesari Rava offered by us are of very good quality. Our in-depth knowledge and experience of procurement procedures with advance techniques applied in production processes ensures that our food product maintains highest standards.

name: Avalakki
description: Pohaa, also known as pauwa, sira, chira, aval or avalakki, among many other names, is flattened rice originating from the Indian subcontinent. Rice is parboiled before flattening so that it can be consumed with very little to no cooking.

name: Aashirvad
description: AASHIRVAAD Whole Wheat Atta is made from the grains which are heavy on the palm, golden amber in colour and hard in bite. It is carefully ground using modern 'chakki - grinding' process which ensures that AASHIRVAAD Atta contains 0% Maida and is 100% Sampoorna Atta.

name: MTR Sambar Powder(200g)
description: Sit back and savour the established flavor of home-made sambar. All with MTR Foods' signature recipe ended the real South Indian way. Pleasure your taste buds with this new variant of Sambar with an additional spice.

name: MTR Puliogare powder(100g)
description: MTR Puliogare Powder is completed of the superiority of well ingredients. Puliyogare or Tamarind Rice is a sharp spicy South Indian Rice range, which is identified for its long shelf life and great journey food. It will give very peppery and tangy flavour to the rice. This dish is regularly served with chutneys, pappadums, and pickles.

name: MTR Gulab Jamun(175g each)
description: Simply make the dough into round balls, fry them until golden brown, and soak them in syrup. Its that easy. Gulab jamuns taste like pancakes saturated in a fragrant rose syrup. Serve them warm with vanilla ice cream for an extra special dessert.

name: MTR Haldi Powder(200g)
description: MTR turmeric powder is one of the most reliable spices as the powder is extracted from high quality turmeric known as Sangali. They are packed with care so that the spice retains its freshness, colour and flavour till it reaches your home.

name: MTR Chili Powder(500g)
description: Chilli is the dried ripe fruit of the genus Capsicum. Capsicum annuum is an annual sub â€“shrub, the flowers of which are borne singly and fruits usually pendent, which provide red peppers, cayenne, paprika and chillies and sweet pepper (bell pepper) a mild form with large inflated fruits.

name: 3 Roses (100g)
description: Brooke Bond 3 Roses tea is tested by professional tea tasters. It is graded and perfectly blended in Brooke Bond's unique Tea Excellence Centre giving it the perfect taste, colour, flavour and irresistible aroma.

name: Kanan Devan (250g)
description: Tata Tea Kanan Devan has handpicked teas that are grown in the Kanan Devan Hills, in Munnar, at an elevation of 5600 feet.Teas grown at this elevation and pristine nature conditions, blended by the experts, give Kanan Devan Classic the distinct fresh flavour that it is famous for Country of Origin: India

name: Gemini (1ltr)
description: It comes with NutriFreshLock technology which helps retain the freshness and nutrients of the food for a long time. It is enriched with the added goodness of Vitamins A, D & E.

name: Bullet Rice (26 KG)
description: It Is A Medium-Grain, Sweet-Smelling Rice That Is Trivial And Low In Starch. Sona Masoori Is Naturally Used In Dishes Such As Biryani, Sweet Pongal, Fried Rice And Idlis. Significant Its Nutrition Information Can Assist You Decide How It Fits Into Your Meal Plan.

name: GRB Ghee (500 gm)
description: GRB Ghee is clarified butter that is usually prepared from cow's milk. It is the clean butterfat left over after the milk solids and water are removed from butter. Ghee is good supply of energy and gives energy to human body. GRB Ghee is used for cooking, garnishing and making Sweets.

name: GRB Ghee (250 gm)
description: GRB Ghee is clarified butter that is usually prepared from cow's milk. It is the clean butterfat left over after the milk solids and water are removed from butter. Ghee is good supply of energy and gives energy to human body. GRB Ghee is used for cooking, garnishing and making Sweets.

name: Honey (200 gm)
description: Honey, sweet, viscous liquid food, dark golden in colour, produced in the honey sacs of various bees from the nectar of flowers. Flavour and colour are determined by the flowers from which the nectar is gathered.

name: IndiaGate Basmati (1 Kg)
description: India Gate Classic Basmati Rice is aged for two years which gives the grains 20% more length and 30% more servings than non-aged rice. When cooked, the grains elongate up to three times in length.

name: NO1 soap pack of 4 (100g each)
description: Contains: 5 units of Godrej No. 1 Bathing Soap, Sandal & Turmeric (100g each), HIGH QUALITY: high TFM (Grade 1 soap) that keeps your skin healthy and glowing ,NATURAL INGREDIENTS: enriched with natural ingredients to make your skin naturally beautiful

name: Santoor soap pack of 4 (150g each)
description: It consists of Sandalwood, which is suitable for dry and oily skin types. It has antimicrobial properties, making it a popular herbal antiseptic for treating minor skin abrasions. It also removes tanning, cures skin itching and detoxifies the skin.

name: Rin soap pack of 6 (250g each)
description: Rin soap bar removes the dirt from the toughest places like cuff and collar with just one stroke. It also leaves your clothes with a pleasant fragrance to keep you feeling fresh all day long

name: Wheel soap pack of 6 (180g each)
description: Active Wheel comes packed with the power of real lemons and flowers. It removes visible dirt and kills invisible bacteria, and leaves behind a trail of floral freshness.

name: SurfExcel soap pack of 6 (150 each)
description: Surf Excel is one of the famed names for removing stubborn stains or grease from the clothes, making them look new and shinier everytime. Surf Excel Detergent Bar 250g is a powerful combination of bleach, vinegar, lemon and blue which altogether offers great cleaning.

name: SurfExcel Detergent (500 gm)
description: The superior technology of Surf excel Quick Wash removes a variety of common tough stains like oil, ketchup, chocolate, curry stains, tea etc. With X-tra cleaning particles, it makes for the perfect wash.
